00178 #if 0 /* UNUSED, remove? */
00179 static int ED_operator_editmesh_face_select(bContext *C)
00180 {
00181     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00182     if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00183         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00184         if (em && em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
00185             return 1;
00186         }
00187     }
00188     return 0;
00189 }
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 void ED_operatormacros_mesh(void)
00193 {
00194     wmOperatorType *ot;
00195     wmOperatorTypeMacro *otmacro;
00196     
00197     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_loopcut_slide", "Loop Cut and Slide", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00198     ot->description = "Cut mesh loop and slide it";
00199     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_loopcut");
00200     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_edge_slide");
00201     RNA_struct_idprops_unset(otmacro->ptr, "release_confirm");
00202 
00203     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_duplicate_move", "Add Duplicate", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00204     ot->description = "Duplicate mesh and move";
00205     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_duplicate");
00206     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00207     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00208     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00209 
00210     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_rip_move", "Rip", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00211     ot->description = "Rip polygons and move the result";
00212     WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_rip");
00213     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00214     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00215     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00216 
00217     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_extrude_region_move", "Extrude Region and Move", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00218     ot->description = "Extrude region and move result";
00219     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_extrude_region");
00220     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00221     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00222     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00223 
00224     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_extrude_faces_move", "Extrude Individual Faces and Move", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00225     ot->description = "Extrude faces and move result";
00226     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_extrude_faces_indiv");
00227     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_shrink_fatten");
00228     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00229     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00230 
00231     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_extrude_edges_move", "Extrude Only Edges and Move", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00232     ot->description = "Extrude edges and move result";
00233     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_extrude_edges_indiv");
00234     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00235     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00236     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00237 
00238     ot = WM_operatortype_append_macro("MESH_OT_extrude_vertices_move", "Extrude Only Vertices and Move", OPTYPE_UNDO | OPTYPE_REGISTER);
00239     ot->description = "Extrude vertices and move result";
00240     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "MESH_OT_extrude_verts_indiv");
00241     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, "TRANSFORM_OT_translate");
00242     RNA_enum_set(otmacro->ptr, "proportional", 0);
00243     RNA_boolean_set(otmacro->ptr, "mirror", FALSE);
00244 }

00246 /* note mesh keymap also for other space? */
00247 void ED_keymap_mesh(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00248 {   
00249     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00250     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00251     int i;
00252     
00253     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Mesh", 0, 0);
00254     keymap->poll = ED_operator_editmesh;
00255     
00256     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_loopcut_slide", RKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00257 
00258     /* selecting */
00259     /* standard mouse selection goes via space_view3d */
00260     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_loop_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00261     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00262     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_loop_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_ALT, 0);
00263     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00264 
00265     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_edgering_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT | KM_CTRL, 0);
00266     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00267     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_edgering_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_ALT | KM_CTRL, 0);
00268     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00269 
00270     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_shortest_path", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00271 
00272     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_all", AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00273     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", SEL_TOGGLE);
00274     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_all", IKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00275     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", SEL_INVERT);
00276 
00277     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_more", PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00278     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_less", PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00279     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_non_manifold", MKEY, KM_PRESS, (KM_CTRL | KM_SHIFT | KM_ALT), 0);
00280     
00281     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_linked", LKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00282     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MESH_OT_select_linked_pick", LKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00283     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "deselect", FALSE);

00293     
00294     /* hide */

00346     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "rotate_source", FALSE);

00349     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_edit_mesh_delete", DELKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00350

00360 
00361     /* menus */
00362     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_edit_mesh_specials", WKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00363     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_edit_mesh_faces", FKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00364     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_edit_mesh_edges", EKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00365     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_edit_mesh_vertices", VKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00366     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_hook", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00367     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_uv_map", UKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00368     WM_keymap_add_menu(keymap, "VIEW3D_MT_vertex_group", GKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00369     
00370     /* useful stuff from object-mode */
00371     for (i = 0; i <= 5; i++) {
00372         kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OBJECT_OT_subdivision_set", ZEROKEY + i, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00373         RNA_int_set(kmi->ptr, "level", i);
00374     }
00375     
00376     ED_object_generic_keymap(keyconf, keymap, 3);
00377     knifetool_modal_keymap(keyconf);
00378 }
